output: html_document
params:

  pg_name: {{pg_name}}

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, fig.width = 16, fig.height=6)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(crssplot)
figs <- readRDS(params$figs_file)
figs <- figs[[params$pg_name]]
side_by_side <- function(p1, p2) {
  (p1 | p2) +
    plot_layout(guides = "collect")
}
```

## August 2020 vs January 2021
### Full Hydrology

```{r fig.height = 6.5}
side_by_side(figs$powell_cloud[[1]], figs$mead_cloud)
```
